pages.text: Vaveliksia comes from the Upper Ediacaran, with fossils found in the Dniester River, Ukraine and White Sea, Russia. It is tubular sponge-like lifeform found in shallow waters and could grow up to 10 cm in height, and possibly partook in filter feeding from the surrounding water.
The generic name derives from the name of Vyacheslav A. Velikanov, a Ukrainian Geologist.
